experiences.title: Junior Software Developer Bootcamp
experiences.subtitle: Generation Thailand
workDescription: Practiced building web applications by using React for front-end, Node.js for back-end, and MongoDB for database management.
Developed effective communication, teamwork and time management skills required to succeed in the bootcamp.

Final Project: MERN Stack CRUD E-commerce Project: Created a responsive travel web-application that allows users to sign up and purchase curated travel programs. The application uses React Router and Axios as front-end dependencies, Express to manage RESTful API, and Mongoose for interacting with MongoDB.

workDescription: Delivered cases used for TUBC and The Challenger case competitions.
Proofread content from the committee's communication channels.
